programme.desc: India v New Zealand. Coverage of the third and final ODI in the series from Holkar Stadium in Indore. programme.title: Detective Dee And The Punished Swellhead
The Legend Of Man And Loong
Huang Jin Gui Shi Lu Film Series
Shining for One Thing
programme.desc: Zhang Wan Sen plans to confess his crush on Lin Bei Xing after the exam. When an accident changes everything tragically, Zhang travels back in time. Can he amend things this time?

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: The Police and gambling association team up to overhaul underground gambling by auctioning new casino licenses. This unveils the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Love is Blind, Hate Too
programme.desc: A year ago, Bo became blind in a serious car accident. One day, an intruder enters her house and takes her hostage. As she tries to survive, she discovers her husband's involvement in her accident!

programme.title: Limbo
programme.desc: After accidentally killing veteran detective Zhan's wife, Wang Tao seeks redemption by assisting Zhan in tracking a serial killer. However, her involvement puts her in grave danger.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau 3
programme.desc: The latest sequel to the action-comedy FROM VEGAS to MACAU brings Andy Lau & Jacky Cheung back in a power-packed new tale.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: Two brothers, a drug lord and a police officer, are involved in a drug cartel's turf battle. After the younger brother's hidden identity as a drug lord is unveiled, an endless battle begins.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: An insurance agent who finds his clients' son dead in their bathroom begins to suspect that the parents may have something to hide.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 1900
programme.desc: In 1900s San Francisco, the murder of a white woman in Chinatown ignites public outrage. Two Chinese detectives race against time to uncover the true killer amid mounting tension and danger.

programme.title: Cyber Heist
programme.desc: After a security engineer unwittingly becomes involved in a money laundering operation, he must fight against his boss in the cyber world to prove his innocence.

programme.title: Wish Comes True
programme.desc: Fei meets young talent Wai who suffers from a rare disease, and helps Wai find his lost love. Even when they know the drug treating Wai is ineffective, they choose to embrace hope and love together.

programme.title: I Did it My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive dark world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and secret operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: Based on a true story, a girl named Suki aspire to fulfill her dream after leaving with her cheating boyfriend. Later, when invited to attend his wedding, she schemes to have her revenge.

programme.title: The Last Tycoon
programme.desc: Framed and forced to leave all he loves, a grocery clerk ultimately grows into one of Shanghai's most powerful mob bosses. Yet, can he leave the past behind?

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Marking the 3rd Eileen Chang adaptation directed by Ann Hui, this film is set in pre-WW2 Hong Kong, where a young girl ends up working for her aunt seducing rich & powerful men.

programme.title: As It Burns
programme.desc: Detective Wei investigates a fatal explosion involving two women who look alike. As he delves deeper, Wei unveils a web of deceit as details from the past and present come together in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: Vanguard, a covert private security, is tasked with protecting an accountant targeted by deadly mercenaries. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: No One Like Me
programme.desc: Yang Qian Huan, once a golden boy, sees his glory fade after the birth of Xu Qi An. Yet, rising from his downfall, Yang defiantly forges his own path, refusing to bow to fate.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: A top-rated film based on a true case in Hong Kong, it tells of a young man who plots with his friend to murder & dismember his parents, resulting in a highly controversial court case.

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: When the reluctant son of a gangster is summoned home to avenge his father's death, he enlists his father's always-drunk bodyguard to help him out.

programme.title: Oversteer
programme.desc: Feng defies his father and leaves home to pursue his dream of becoming an auto mechanic. Along the way, he unexpectedly finds himself drawn into the thrilling world of car racing.

programme.title: Stuntman
programme.desc: A washed-up stunt director is struggling to find his way in the changing film industry. He risks everything to make a comeback, while striving to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behavior and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. When he meets his teenage nephew who is ashamed of his stutter, the two develop a special friendship through mutual understanding.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: When Fleur join her university's hip hop team, a journey begins which lead her into the heated world of dance competitions and a complicated romance.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: New Hong Kong immigrants Yuan and her sister face identity crises, poverty and their father's drug addiction. Even as they separate from their father, Yuan finds his traits mirrored in her loved ones.

programme.title: Wild City
programme.desc: Hong Kong director Ringo Lam returns after seven years with this action drama in which a cop-turned-bar-owner & his brother are pulled into a gang war.
